definitions.definition: A sudden , often involuntary expulsion of air from the lungs through the glottis ( causing a short , explosive sound ), and out through the mouth .
examples: Behind me, I heard a distinct, dry cough .

definitions.definition: A bout of repeated coughing (verb sense 2.1 ) ; also, a medical condition that causes one to cough.
examples: Sorry, I can’t come to work today—I’ve got a nasty cough .

definitions.definition: A noise or sound like a cough ( sense 1 ) .
A vocalisation from a bird or other animal resembling a human cough.

main_definition: A sudden , often involuntary expulsion of air from the lungs through the glottis ( causing a short , explosive sound ), and out through the mouth .
secondary_definitions: A bout of repeated coughing (verb sense 2.1 ) ; also, a medical condition that causes one to cough.
( figurative ) A noise or sound like a cough ( sense 1 ) .
A vocalisation from a bird or other animal resembling a human cough.
